dang po sgrib pa rnam par sel bas bskul nas mtha' 'khob tu 'gro ba idang /
zhes gnya' khri btsan po dang /
kun tu bzang po nyid kyis bskul nas mtha' 'khob tu 'gro ba dang zhes lta tho tho ri yin /
khyed rang gi thugs rjes bskul nas mtha' 'khob tu 'gro ba dang zhes srong btsan sgam po yin /
rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis bskul nas mtha' 'khob tu 'gro ba dang bzhi zhes khri srong lde btsan yin pa la snga ma gsum la chos kyi dbu brnyes srol btod dar rgyas kyi sgo nas phan pa shin tu che /
'jam dpal dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni khri srong lde btsan te /
khri srong de las kyang 'od zer gnyis 'phros te /
zhes snga ma mu ne btsan po dang phyi ma mu tig btsan po gnyis thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i khri yongs su srung bar byed pa lha gzhan gyis bar du bcad pas mi tshugs pas btsun pa spyan ras gzigs nyid kyi sprul pa khri srong lde btsan te /
de'i dpung pa'i 'od zer la brten te byung ba bar chod phra zhing phra ba bsrung bar mi nus pa mi rigs pa'i sgo nas btags pas sad na legs mjing yon zhes bya ba 'byung ste zhes dang /
de nyid las khyed rang yang spyan ras gzigs kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par ltos shig ming ni gnya' khri btsan po zer na'ang gyis shig /
lha sems can thams cad kyi las la brten nas kha na ma tho ba med par ri rgyal lhun po ltar brjid chags par gnas pas lha tho tho ri zer na'ang gyis shig /
tho ba ni sems can gyi las la brten nas 'byung snying 'dod pa'o / /
ri zhes bya ba ni 'jam dbyangs kyi bzhed pas gdug rtsub can phye ma leb kyi gshog pa lta bus bskrod par mi nus pa la zer la /
kun tu bzang po ni sems can las bzang po can gyi snang ba la chos rgyal de lta bu 'byung ba ni ri bo zhes dper na nyo tshong lta bu la dngos 'di na gser yin na zho 'di tsam re bo /
'di tsam mi ri bo zhes zer ba dang 'dra bar sems can las bzang po can gyi snang ba la rgyal po 'di lta bu 'byung ba ri bo zhes pa'i don du bzhed pa dper byas so / /
gzhan ni gzhan du 'dogs te de la ni rgyu mtshan med do zhes deng sang grags pa ltar gyi rgyal po'i snyan shal la mtho do do yod pas mtshan yang de skad grags zhes zer ba sogs la rgyu mtshan yang dag med pas mi bden pa'i don no / /
gzhan yang thugs sgam pa dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yo srong ba dang /
rang gi thugs rje gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus btsan pas te rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas nyid kyi sras srong btsan sgam po ste de skad zer na'ang gyis sngon zhing khams shig tu bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa la brten nas nye ba'i sras bdun gyis gsol ba btab ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i gzhi thabs shes rab gnyis su mi rtog pa rdo rje bsnol ba'i khri mi g.yo bar srong bar mdzad pas bdud sde gang gis kyang bar chod mi tshugs pas lha btsan po zhes 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhed pas khri srong lde btsan ces zer na'ang gyis /

smad mdo khams kyi cha ni rtsi shing dang nags tshal gyi yal ga stug pos khyab pa spre'u dang brag srin gyi yul 'gro ba kun kyang srog gcod sogs ngan song gi rgyu la bag med du longs spyad pa'i rkyen gyis yul gru de dag gi 'og tu dmyal ba'i gnas lcags kyi za ma tog lta bu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i snod du mkhyen nas 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong gi sku'i rnam pas lha sa'i thad kyi 'dzin ma'i ngos su byon nas dmyal ba'i gnas kyang 'chi med lha'i dga' tshal ltar byin gyis brlabs /

gser gyi mchod rten /

yab rgyal po gnam ri srong btsan dang /
yum tshe spong bza' 'bri ma thod dkar gyi sras su kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen zhi ba chos dbyings su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong dang lnga brgya nyag ma brgyad 'das pa 'gal ba zhes pa sa mo glang gi lo la pho brang byams pa mi 'gyur gling du sku 'khrungs shing yab sogs kyis dbu gtsug gi a mi de wa gzigs pas rgyal po mgo gnyis par yang grags /
de dang dus mtshungs su rgya bal gyi bza' gnyis kyang bltams /
dgung lo bcu gsum bzhes pa nas yab kyis 'jigs pa med pa seng ge'i khri la stobs kyi 'khor los na sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur /
de tshe rgyal po'i thugs dgongs la nga kha ba can pa'i 'gro don byed pa la dbang bskur ba po zhig byung na ci ma rung snyam du dgongs pa'i tshe /
dpal kun tu bzang pos rin po che'i bum pa lha'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bas sku khrus gsol zhing a mi ta b+ha ba ste zur chag a mi de wa don 'od dpag med des phyag g.yas brkyang ste rgyal po'i dbu la reg nas dbang bskur bas brjod par dka' ba'i sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa dang gzigs pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i mtshan ma mtha' klas par gyur te /
po ta la'i ri 'di'i rtse la pho brang btab nas bzhugs na mtha' bzhi'i dregs ldan gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis rang dbang med par gus pas 'dud pa'i dbang phyug brgyad kyi yon tan mtha' dag lhun gyis grub par dgongs nas bshul du zhugs te ge re'i 'phrang du phebs pa na yig drug rang byon zhal gzigs nas sku khrus gsol zhing gsol ba btab pas /
de las dbang po'i gzhu ltar bkra ba'i 'od zer kha dog sna lnga 'phros pa pha ri'i brag la spyan ras gzigs /
sgrol ma /
rta mgrin gsum gyi sku'i snang brnyan rang byon du shar ba la phog /
de las kyang yi ge drug pa la tshur phog pa'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba 'dren byed kyi yul du ngo mtshar ba'i gzigs mor gyur pa la 'ja' mdangs zhes skye bo rnams gleng ngo / /

bzhi bcur nye dus thugs gter nges par phradH. dngos dang nyams su nga yis dbang bzhi bskurH. dpa' bo mkha' 'gros bskul ma thengs gsum yongH. de dus the tshom ma byed gnad thems yinH. rnam par snang mdzad thugs kyi klong sgrom naH. bla ma'i sgrub pa yongs 'dus rnam gsum yodH. sgra sgrog 'brug gi lo la babs pa'i dusH. gter bdag bya dkar smyug rgod gtor mas mchodH. rang nyid dbang drag nga rgyal ldan pa yisH. bden pa bdar zhing dam bsgrag gnad them yinH. dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs skong brgya rtsas bkangH. gnas chen kun myul 'byor dgu zhen med byaH. chos brgyad spang zhing tshe 'di blo yis btangH. sa gcig mi gnas gnas chen kun tu songH. dpa' bo mkha' 'gros lung ston gter dang phradH. ces dang /

'di nas nyi ma nub phyogs suH. yang 'dul pra dun rtse yi lhoH. ge gar klu yi kha gnon byangH ri rgyal glang chen 'gying 'dra'i 'dabH. chu chen drag po 'bab pa'i 'gramH. glo bo ma thang zhes bya'i phurH. rje rigs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor paH. pha ma rgyal mtshan gnyis kyi buH. kun bzang dgongs pa'i ba klongs nas bskrunH. bi ma 'tsho rgyal sprul pa'i srasH. spun bdun tshigs sam mtha' ru 'byungH. lhums nas hUM hri'i sgra sgrog cingH. skyes pa'i lo nas bde skyid ldanH. yul khams bde zhing bsam don 'grubH. chu khams lug gam sprel lo paH. bdag gis byin brlabs padma rgyalH. zhes mnga' ris glo bo ge gar gyi yul dang sngags 'chang 'jam dbyang rgyal mtshan yab yum gnyis kyi mtshan /

'khon gyi gdung rabs rim par brgyud pa slob dpon bsod nams rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i sras su rab byung bzhi pa'i shing lug la g.yas ru ngam ring klu khung du bltams /

thog mar mtshan sri chod dpal bzang po zhes par gsol la /

zhabs kyi padma'i mchu ba ni glang po che'i sna ltar brkyangs nas drang srong chen po de'i dbu la phyag dbang dang zhabs dbang gnang bar chas te spyan 'bur tshugs su gzigs pas zil gyis mnan pa dang /

rat+na gling pa'i gter lung las /
de nas sngon gyi thugs bskyed rgyal po niH. thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa dbus nas 'byungH. blo gros stobs ldan bzang po'i 'od zer canH. sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba'i kha lo bsgyurH. chos kyi rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa 'byungH. 'bri yi r+wa co phag gi 'jug ma canH. gung gi tshang 'cha' sa yi zas za zhingH. mig bzhi gyen thur dag la lta bar byedH. lce gnyis bden rdzun gnyis kyi bshan 'byed paH. dbus gtsang thams cad sku yi chab 'og na 'dusH. rdzu 'phrul mthu ldan bstan pa'i bdag po 'byungH. lha sa dmar po ri dang chu bo riH. has po ri dang dbus ri de gsum laH. pho brang byas nas dbus g.yor mtha' gsum sdudH. gtsang gi ngam ru ri dang ri bo cheH. la stod rdo rje'i ri dang de gsum laH. pho brang bcas nas gtsang gi ru gnyis dangH. mnga' ris bal po'i bar rnams dbang du sdudH. dbus gtsang rnams su chos gra bcu gsum 'cha'H. gzhan gyi rdzong rnams rtsig rmang tsam yang medH. la 'jam lung 'jam thams cad gser khur lamH. nor yod gnyer 'tsho mi dgos gang yod phanH. med rnams btsal 'gro mi dgos kun kyang skyidH. dbu zlum mdo yi bstan pa dar zhing rgyasH. lcang lo sngags pa'i bstan pas grub thob khengsH. pha ma'i drin glon nad pa legs par srelH. bla ma slob dpon rje 'bangs dpon g.yog sogsH. che chung bzang ngan steng 'og bshan yang 'byedH. ngan byed mthar 'don mi ngan thor mi 'jugH. bzang 'drin yar bas kun la bya dga' byedH. pho mo na gzhon thams cad nyan bshad byedH. bsam rdzogs rgan po thams cad don la sgomH. rgyal khrims gser gyi gnya' shing lci la sbramH. chos khrims dar gyi mdud pa dam la 'jamH. nad mtshon mu ge sdug bsngal gang yang medH. bde skyid lha yul lta bu kun kyang 'tshoH. zhes sogs spyi lung 'di nas le tshan kha shas lung bstan cing /
lung bstan chen mo 'di dang tshig don phal cher mthun par rdo rje gling pa'i lung bstan las kyang /
de nas sngon gyi thugs skyed rgyal po niH. 'bri yi r+wa co phag gi 'jug ma tsamH. gung gi tshang 'cha' sa yi zas za zhingH. mig ni gyen thur dag tu lta bar byedH. lce yis bden rdzun shan thang rab tu 'byedH. rdzu 'phrul mthu ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'byungH. dmar po ri ba dang chu bo has po riH. dbus kyi ri gsum dag la khrom chen 'cha'H. gtsang gi ri bo che dang ngam ru riH. la stod rdo rje'i ri dang gsum po laH. pho brang brtsigs nas chos gra bcu gsum 'cha'H. gzhan gyi rdzong rnams rtsig rmang tsam yang medH. lam 'jam 'phrang bde byis par gser bskur thubH. yod pa gnyer ka mi dgos gar bzhag yodH. med pa rtsol sgrub mi dgos lag bde'oH. lcang lo sngags kyi sgrub pa'i bstan pa rgyasH. drin can lan slon bar lag legs par skyongH. dpon slob rje 'bangs gong 'og shan thang 'byedH. ngan byed mthar 'don mi tsam sgra mi gragsH. bzang spyod ya rabs kun la bya dga' byedH. dran gsal gzhon pa thams cad nyan bshad byedH. bsam rdzogs rgan pa thams cad don la sgomH. rgyal khrims gser gyi gnya' shing brjid la sbramH. chos khrims dar gyi mdud pa lta bur damH. zhes pa'i lung bstan le tshan gyi dus rtags ni /
'bri gung chos kyi grags pa yan chad bla ma'i rnam thar bzang po dang skyu ra gdung gi brgyud pa rdzogs pa 'bri'i lus kyi cha shas las r+wa co tsam lus pa gyen du zad pa /
sne sdong pa'i mnga' thang rnams mthar gdol spyod lta bu'i thur du zad pa phag lus kyi cha shas las mjug ma tsam lus pa'i dus su /
skyid shod lha sa tshal pa khri skor gyi 'og yin pas der pho brang bcas pas gung gi tshang bca' ba sngar hor gyis sa skya pa la 'ja' sa bcad pa'i khri skor bcu gsum po thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas sa yi zas za zhing mchod gnas sde gnyis sogs mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dar zhing ya rabs la bya dga' dang ma rabs mthor mi 'jug pa'i bka' khrims lci bas rdzogs ldan lta bur bde ba dang chos gra rnying par zhig gso sogs ma yin par gsar pa bcu gsum brtsig pa dang /

byang chub sems bskyed na brtan gyur gang yin pa / /
de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med / /
ces sogs du ma las rgya cher gsungs pa ltar /
dkon cog la sri zhu'i rim pa zhabs brtan du dmigs par /
sa lug tha skar zla ba'i tshes gcig nas bzung /
dga' ldan dngul gdung rin po che'i sku mdun du mchod pa sna lnga gsar 'dzugs lnga bcu tshar gcig ji srid bstan pa rin po che nam gnas kyi bar btsugs pa'i lo 'khor gyi rgyu 'gro gong dngul thog tu phab par srang lnga brgya bcu drug zho drug skar gsum sum cha gcig /
mchod 'bul ba gsum la spyir zla phogs lo 'khor bsdoms par rin gong dngul srang bcu zho dgu skar phyed do drug cha gcig /
rdzong dkar mchod khang du dkon gnyer gsar bkod byas ngos mchod rgyun gsar btsugs lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul srang bdun zho dgu /
ru lag grom pa rgyang gi lha khang gtso bor mchod pa yod bzhin pa'i thog /
slar yang je 'phel du bsams bar skor steng yum bu lung bcas lha khang bdun du mar me'i mchod rgyun gyi lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul srang dgu zho gsum skar gsum sum cha gcig /
'ol dga' gzims chung khams gsum rnam rgyal du mchod rgyun gsar btsugs lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul thog tu phab par srang gsum zho bdun skar brgyad /
gru mer chen pos bzhengs pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po sol nag thang po che'i rten dang brten par bcas par ji srid nam mkha' zad par ma gyur pa de srid du ri bo bde chen pa dge 'dun bzhi grwas mchod 'bul bcas gsar gtsugs kyi rin gong dngul srang bzhi brgya bcu gcig zho gsum skar gsum sum cha gcig /
mchod 'bul ba bzhi dang ja ma gcig bcas kyi zhabs tog yon dang bcas lo 'khor du rin gong dngul srang ba bzhi bcu zhe drug zho dgu skar phyed bzhi /
lcags spre chu stod zla ba'i tshes bzhi ston pa thub pa'i dbang pos bden pa bzhi'i chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi nyin nas bzung ji srid bstan pa rin po che gnas kyi bar yer pa'i lha khang bcu gnyis so sor 'bru me nyin 'khyong sdong rkang re rgyun btsugs lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul srang nyi shu rtsa brgyad zho gsum skar gsum sum cha gcig /
rnam gling du rgyal gsol mchod chas lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul srang do zho dgu skar dgu /
lcags byar gzhis rtse bzhi sde skor lam khams gsum byams pa'i sku mdun dbu rtse lha khang shar nub bsgril ba bcas lo 'khor gyi mchod rgyun gyi rin gong dngul srang phyed bcu gcig /
zhogs star mchod rol gtong mi lha bsangs bcas kyi rin gong dngul srang do zho gsum skar phyed bzhi bzhi cha gcig /
rtse sgang snying phu ba'i bla ma'i rten mchod chas rtsis bzhes pa lha khang zla bsgril la mchod par lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul srang bzhi zho gsum skar phyed do /
gong gsal sa lug nas lcags bya bar gyi mchod rgyun lo 'khor gyi thog khyon gcig tu bsdom pa'i rin gong dngul srang dgu brgya go lnga zho gang skar do /
mchod 'bul ba'i phog yon sogs kyi rin gong dngul srang drug cu zho gang skar phyed dgu drug cha phyed gsum rnams dang /
chos sde gsar btsugs gras /
sa lug gtsang phung po ri bo cher bdud dpung zil gnon gling gi lo 'khor dus gtor sogs mchod rgyun gyi ri gong dngul srang sum cu so bzhi zho brgyad /
lcags spre lho brag chos sde dga' ldan gsang sngags bde chen gyi gtsang khang gis dbus pa'i dus gtor dang bcas lo 'khor gyi mchod rgyun gyi rin gong bsdoms par dngul srang lnga bcu nga bzhi zho brgyad skar gang /
lcags bya chu dbar dga' ldan 'gro phan gling rgyun dang dus gtor sogs lo 'khor gyi na mchod pa'i rin gong bsdoms par dngul srang drug zho bdun skar gsum /
mtsho sna rta wang dga' ldan rnam rgyal lha rtse gsar du bskrun pa'i mchod rgyun dus gtor dang bcas pa'i lo 'khor gyi ri gong bsdoms par dngul srang nyi shu zho gsum skar lnga lhag bcas /
mtsho sna phyogs su gzhan lugs btsun dgon mang tsam 'dug pa ngan spyod sna tshogs kyi gnas dbyung lta bu'i ring lugs tshul ldan gyi dga' ldan 'gro don gling gsar du bskrun pa'i mchod rgyun lo 'khor gyi rin gong dngul srang bzhi zho do skar phyed lnga lhag bcas /
dpal o rgyan chen po'i thugs kyi sgrub gnas lho brag mkhar chur bdud 'joms gling gsar du btsugs pa'i mchod khang khag la 'khor yug tu mchod pa chag med dang dus gtor sogs kyi ri gong dngul srang drug cu re gsum zho gsum skar lnga lhag bcas /
dge bcu bkra shis gling gi lo 'khor mchod rgyun rin gong dngul srang bcu gsum zho dgu skar phyed drug lhag bcas rnams /
gsar btsugs chos sde'i mchod rgyun khyon gcig tu bsdoms par ri gong dngul srang brgya dang dgu cu go brgyad zho do skar phyed lnga lhag bcas rnams /
gong gsal sa lug lcags spre lcags bya'i bar mchod rgyun gsar spar dang /
chos sde gsar btsugs kyi dus gtor dang mchod rgyun gyi rigs bar bsdoms gsum khyon gcig tu bsdoms par dngul srang chig stong nyis brgya lnga bcu nga gsum zho lnga skar phyed drug lhag bcas byung ba dngul 'brus lha sa'i khrom thang ltar srang rer gshor khal bco brgyad re rtsis 'bru gshor 'bo'i khal nyis khri nyis stong lnga brgya drug cu re bzhi phul phyed lnga lhag bcas rnams bstar ro / /
lus mtha' dag gzugs can /
med gzugs su ma grub de srid bar / /
mi g.yo mtha' klas 'gro ba mgon nyin byed dbang / /

don grub nas bzung blo ngan shar ba'i bar / /
mchog phul byung /

kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin gyis gnam sa bkang / /
zhes bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o / /
'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs las /
gang zhig dge ba'i las byed pa / /
de ni dge bar 'gyur ba yin / /

de yang ma dros pa'i zhus pa'i mdo las /

ces dang /
yang de nyid las /

zhes dang mthun par /
rgyud bla mar rig grol yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa sogs bshad pas / /
bsod nams kyi zhing gsog pa dge 'dun dkon cog ste /
de la yang nang gses su mchod pa'i gnas sde gnyis sogs rgya cher gsungs pa ltar rje bla ma phyag na pad dkar ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol pa lha dang bcas pa'i skyabs mgon dam pa ngag gi dbang phyug blo bzang rgya mtsho zhes snyan pa'i ba dan srid rtser bsgreng ba 'di nyid zhabs pad bskal pa las kyang bskal par brtan du re ba'i ched dge 'dun dkon cog la 'tsho ba'i ched du chos gzhis zur 'byed dang gshor 'debs sogs bsnyen bkur sa lug nged rang gi srid skyong gis zhabs phyi nas lcags bya phan zhus rigs /
sa lug mdo khams khul rdzong gzhis che ba bcu gsum gyi mnga' khul la rang phyogs dge lugs gtso bor gyur pa'i lha sde dgon khag drug brgya lnga bcu nga bdun la gra grangs sum khri chig stong dgu brgya bzhi bcu zhe bdun rnams 'dug par dge dgon rnams la gdugs dkar /
mtshan brjod /
ris med tshang mas rje bla ma'i zhabs brtan tshe dpag med mgon ma dang /
tshangs pa dung thod can gyis phul ba'i mtha' yas zhing bzhugs ma gnyis rgyun 'don /
rnying dgon dam sel med rigs nas sku rim gal che'i dmigs bsal gyi cho ga phyag len ma nyams par dgos pa /
de ga'i nang tshan nas rang phyogs dge lugs kyi dgon tshugs mi zin par nye ba re rnams 'di ga'i bkod pa bzhin yul gru 'brel mtshungs na sgra brgyun dang /
dkor sa dge khongs phye gsal mchod sprin gyi rgyun dang phogs thebs kyi ldom bu bcas na dad 'bul dad bzhes byas chog pa /
sa rnying sogs la rje bla ma srid zhi'i gtsug rgyan chen po'i bka' tham gtan tshigs gtsang btsan gyis chod rigs de don dang /
gzhan ma mchod yul dge lugs gtsor 'don dgos pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
de dag la med du mi rung ba'i bca' yig yul dus gnas skabs gang zag sogs kyi babs dang bstun pa bcas song zhing /
gra grangs gong thog nas dge lugs sum gnyis tsam yin dbang la gdugs dkar mtshan brjod kyi 'dzugs ja mar tsha 'o bcas 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal sum brgya drug cu bre bcu bdun phul do lnga cha gnyis /
'dra mkhar thog dgon rnying khungs kyi rten gsum mchod rdzas /

'dren dpyad /
khang pa chos gzhis /

gzhan phyogs kyi khang pa /
chos zhing sogs kyang gsar sbyor phye gsal byas pa bsdoms 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal drug stong nyis brgya drug cu re gcig bre bcu gcig phul do /
'dra rtsi thog dgon grub mtha' dge lugs su bsgyur ba dang /
rgyal chos lha khang du gtogs pa'i rten gsum mchod rdzas /
thab gdan cha /
'dren dpyad /
dgon gnas khang pa chos gzhis sa zhing sogs phyi nang bar gsum gyi bdag thob che phra gzhi rten chos gzhis su phye gsal byas pa bsdoms 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal sum stong dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa bdun bre bcu drug /
mdo rab sgang khul dga' ldan chos gling par /
dpal yul bon dgon dam pa rang grol gyis 'dzin bdag byed thog nas phye gsal bgyis par /
lag 'debs mkhar ru'i khal sum brgya nyi shu rtsa ba gnyis bre bcu bzhi phul lnga bzhi cha gcig /
mdo rab sgang 'gi ba kha par mi'u rong 'du ra dgon gyi mchod zhing dang /
tsher ma rong ltag la'i khang pa bcas gzhi rten la sbyin 'jags byas pa rin gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal nyis brgya dang dgu bcu go drug bre bco lnga /
rab sgang rgyud zur dgon spyi sor bon dgon 'geb sprod pa dang /
nya snga rgya mtsho /
si'u rong snga dkar phu bcas kyi 'dzin shul khang zhing dang /
sgo ra shar pa'i sgo khral steng nas spu gnag bcas phye gsal byas pa'i rin gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal lnga brgya dang bdun cu don bzhi bre bcu drug phul phyed bzhi cha gcig /
dge phyin dgon par ja tshul thebs la rong ja dang ru ba bcas 'brur phab ru'i khal brgyad brgya bdun cu /
rab sgang te lo dgon gsar ba'i chos gzhis su stag stag ri khrod pa bon dgon 'gi la'u /
sgom pa seng ge 'od sku ti ri dgon bcas kyi ri gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal nyis brgya dang bcu dgu bre dgu /
rab sgang stod sku lnga mchod par be lo dgon 'dzin shul kha gtsang dang bon po ldum ra ba'i zhing tshan brgyad /
khri 'jam mo snyi zhabs dang khang pa bcas pa'i rin gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal nyis brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga bre bco lnga /
rab sgang gnas mgo lnga mchod par bsod nams g.yung drung gi zhing dang /
dpal 'dzin rong bsdu rab kyi khang pa gcig bcas pa'i rin gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal brgya dang brgyad cu gya bdun bre bcu bdun phul phyed lnga /
mdo rab sgang khul lnga mchod bar gtsug lag khang /
rung khang /
gra shag sogs gsar rgyag gi rdo shing bzo bo 'u lag bcas pa'i phogs gla rnams bsdoms 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal drug stong bzhi brgya bcu gnyis bre drug phul bzhi na dang /
yang bon dgon ldum ra bas 'dzin shul zhing 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal bdun cu don bzhi bre bcu gnyis phul phyed bzhi bzhi cha gcig /
de mo 'phags pa chos rdzong par 'bru mkhar ru'i khal sum brgya lo star bkar rgya bas gshor 'dzin 'ba' chos sde dga' ldan bde gling bar lo mjug sku rim skabs tsha ra gtong ba'i sha rtsam bzhes spro bcas 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal sum brgya gnyis bre do /
'ba' khul dge dgon gtsug nor bu dgon par dud bcu drug gi lag yod dngul nas bra bo bcas 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal brgya dang dgu bcu go dgu bre lnga phul phyed bzhi /
chab nag ri bo dga' ldan par bla ma bkra shis chos 'phel gyis zhu nan byung ba bzhin se mo nas mi ser dud 'dzin la rkang sum cu phyed so gnyis /

mar /

lcags spre /
dpal 'bar chos sde 'di 'gro ba'i mgon po 'phags pa rin po ches phyag ris su bstar ba nas bzung khams lho stod kyi char dge lugs kyi sde rim gyis chags pa'i phyi mo lta bu yin 'dug pa dang /
de rjes su gung ru rin chen byang chub pas dge lugs su bsgyur /
de rjes gzhung nas lar rgya la bsams pa'i phogs bdag rkyen dang /

nyang gi tham po'i gter ma ru dra bsgral dus kyi tsan dan sbrul snying srog shing du yod pa karma bdud 'dul /
yang rdzong du slob dpon chen po dang 'tsho rgyal gsang spyod mdzad pa'i dus rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas rdo rje gdan du bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas pa'i dus sku rgyab brten pa'i byang chub shing gi dum bu phul bar o rgyan phyag bzo'i bla ma thugs mchog sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang 'phyong rgyas 'phying ba'i bang so nas nyang gis gdan drangs pa chos rgyal mang+ga'i mtshan can gyi thugs dam rten /
kun skyong gling pa'i zangs sku me thub ma /
rat+na gling pas gung thang mkhar nas gdan drangs pa'i padma mthong grol /
rat+na'i 'tsho rgyal sku tshab 'gro ba kun grol 'tsho rgyal skor gsum las phyi sgrub dang mthun pa /
chos dbang gter ma'i padma mthong grol /
gter ston shes rab 'od zer gyi khra 'brug gi gter ma'i rigs 'dus padma gu ru /
chos dbang gi gter ma'i lcags sku /
chos rgyal gter bdag gling pas g.ya' ma lung nas spyan drangs pa'i padma mthong grol /
bka' brgyad bde 'dus shog ser pu sti gsum rgyal po'i bla dpe sgrom bu dang bcas pa /
mdzad pa bcu gcig sogs chos dbang gter ma'i shog ser /
rta mgrin dreg pa zil gnon rgyud kyi shog ser chu glang gi r+wa la dril shing byas pa /
nyang gter kun tu bzang mo'i las rgyud /
za hor rgyal po'i phul ba'i o rgyan chen po'i phyag rdor khams gsum zil na gnon mon bum thang dge gnas brag nas nyang gis gdan drangs pa /
phyag na rdo rje mkhan chen las kyi rdo rje'i thugs dam rten /
klong chen pa'i zhun thigs kyi tshe dpag med rnams la byin rlabs bzhes skabs yin 'dug pa nas gzims chung 'gag pa dbang ldan zangs sku me thub ma nged kyi sngags srung du skyel ba dang sbrags bslab stan la nged la skyon med khyod rang gdon gnod 'dra yin shas che phebs /
nged rang la yang drung 'tsho dar mo bal lto bshal zhig gtong zer yang nged rang gis sbyongs byed ma dgos tsam e yong gi zhi byed btang ba'i rim bdes tshes nyer bzhi nas lag par bdud rtsi chu tshan zhig shed gso dang sbrags byed mur de nyin drung 'tsho ba nged kyi sa nas rdab zhogs kyis langs song /
tshe nyer lnga'i zhogs drung 'tsho dang dar mo nas 'byor byung ba /
gong zhabs rin po che'i phyag rtsa legs po mi 'dug cing /
bslab ston du sde pa 'byon thub tshe skad thong gnang byung tshul zer pa /
de 'phral nged rang 'gro mi thub pa rang yang med pas khyod rang sngon du byon /
nged da lta yongs na mi tsho dogs pa zos 'gro bas mnga' ris kyi bang chen 'byor tshul la kha g.yar tsha rting khar yong /
bslab ston zhus nas dbu mdzad la na bza' spong dag gi grabs gyis zer lan bskur dang /
gnas chung du sku phebs la chang khyim nga dbang mkhyen brtse brdzangs /
de nas su zhabs su phyin pa phyag dbang sngar shas cher phyag res gnang yang 'di nyin gnyis kyis stsol ba dang sbrag nged kyi khams dri zhim par sal de lan phul zhing sku khams babs ma legs pa dang /
sku sbyongs gnang ba cung zad thal skyon /
da cha sku'i gegs sel du gter ston rin po che yang ba gdan drangs na snyam pa ji ltar lags zhus par /
gdan drangs kyang sa khad 'gyangs pas 'phral du mi phebs 'dug pas drangs shan 'dra tshul gnang zhing /
la mo lho kha'i chos skyong gi rigs la dri ba byas na zhus par blo dang bstun gnang /
zhabs brtan du na bza' spong dag 'di 'bab che ba nas zhab brtan rigs e chog sogs bslab ston zhus tshad de dag byas chos phebs par ser 'bras /
rnam rgya gra tshang bcas par mi rer dngul zho lnga re'i rtsis kyi na bza' spong dag /
gra tshang nas sku glud dang dkar po bcu gsum dgung grags sogs de nyin btang /
nged la sbyongs phigs po yang byung na rgyu yang mi 'dug skyon nam yong zhes sogs stsal te mdor phebs pa de skabs sgo mang pa'i mkhar las skabs nas pad rdor chos mdzad 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal la mkhar las la brten pa'i sku rtsed gnang /
nam mkha' shin tu dangs 'ja' sprin long long 'dug par da cha ne'u le yang 'byor ba'i dbyar nyams bcas e 'dug ces stsal zhing spyan nam mkha' rang du gzigs bdag cag rnams kyi ma rtogs pa las /

de steng rgyal skor ba bsod nams dbang po /
bal po mkhas pa in+du sim can nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
gser 'dul dbu mdzad 'ba' lhug can bcu bzhi /
phogs sprod mi bzad gzhis sdod chu mig kha pa lnga 'dzom dang /
de 'phros lha sa sogs su bzo gra yod par rgyal thang pa phun tshogs kyis byas pa ba nas sku rgyu phogs ston yon sogs khyon dngul srang chig khri nyis stong bzhi bcu zhe gnyis zho lnga skar phyed dgu lhag bcas byung ba 'brur phab gshor khal nyis 'bum chig khri drug stong bdun brgya drug cu re dgu bre bcu gcig phul gang rnams las bskrun no / /
chags zur gyi phra mo /
pa'i mdangs ldan ljon shing ma ma'i gzhir / /

zhes bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o / /
sa sbrul 'phyong rgyas 'phying dbar stag rtser ba'i 'gyur rin po che ma phyi rgyal rtse them spangs ma sor bzhag thog rnying rgyud bsnan pa bcas po ti brgya dang bcu bzhi /
chos shog ljang gu'i thog rin chen bzhi pa las grub pa'i yig gzugs brda dag phul du phyin pa'i sgros gtsang /
dbu shog dang po lto gar 'bur ma g.yas g.yon du dbu lha 'jam bris /
zhal khebs bzhi brtsegs kyi steng nas rim pas hor jus gzhi lu /

'od zer dri med las /
bzheng ba po gtso bor gyur pa tshe zad pa la tshe ring por 'gyur ro / /

tha na bya ri dwags sogs mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa rnams kyang ngan 'gror mi skye zhing mtshams med sogs kyi sdig pa 'byang ba /

mchod rten de la skor ba gcig gam /

rgyang ring po nas mthong ba'am /
dril bu'i sgra thos pa'am /

chu khyi nas lcags rta bar rje bla ma'i dgongs rdzogs su dmigs te 'dus sde khag gi dge 'dun la sri zhu bsnyen bkur gyi rigs dang /
chos sde gsar btsugs sogs kyi skor /
thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo las /
'jig rten gyi rin chen sna bdun po phongs pa rnams la 'tsho bar bskyangs pa dang 'dra bar dkon cog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams na kyi chos kyi sku skyed pa /
ye shes spel bar byed pa dkon cog ces bya'o / /
dkon cog gsum po tha dad pa ni sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa'i gnyid las sangs pa'o / /
dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i gnas sam ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya ba'o / /
zhes dang /
yang de nyid las /
rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do / /
nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni dge 'dun dkon cog tu bshad do / /
yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang gtan tshigs su dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni chos dkon cog ces bya'o / /
zhes dkon cog gsum la rgya cher bsngags pa'i nang dge 'dun dkon cog ni / /
sangs rgyas phal po cher /
rgyal ba gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa / /
de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste / /
sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon / /
de dag rnams la byin pa dpag med 'gyur / /
ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de / /

ces dang /
dran pa nyer gzhag las /
rten dang brten par bcas bskrun dang / /
dge 'dun gnas mal bca' ba sogs / /
dge nas dge bar rtag tu 'gyur / /
bskal pa bye ba stong du yang / /
dge ba yongs su chud mi 'dza' /
zhes dang /
mdo sde nyi ma'i snying po las /
gal te dge slong chos kyi gnas pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pa /
ngo tsha shes pa dang /
khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dge slong lnga'am ba bdun /
rgyal po dge slong gi dge 'dun de ni ches tshad med pa dang ldan zhing sbyin gnas chen po dang /
lha dang mi thams cad kyi mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro / /
zhes dang /
khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo las /
gang gis a ru gcig tsam yang dge 'dun la dbul bar byed na de nad kyi bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro / /
gang zhig gis zas nal rtse gang tsam dge 'dun la phul na de mu ge'i bar gyi bskal par mi skye bar 'gyur ro / /
zhes dang /
'phags pa rnga bo chen po'i mdo las /
skyes bu dpa' ba de'i zla ba phyed kyi za ma gcig gcig 'byung ste /
des za ma gcig po yang dge slong rnams la byin na bsod nams mi zad pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro / /
zhes dang /
gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad pa las /
tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs nas lhags pa la / /
su dag dga' zhing mal stan sbyin byed pa'i / /
mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na / /
gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog rnams 'thob / /
su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi /
kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa / /
de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na /
kha zas kha dog ro la sogs ldan 'thob / /
su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi / /
btung ba rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa / /
de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na / /
btung ba kha dog ro la sogs pa 'thob / /
su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi / /
dam chos tshul bzang thos nas nyams su len /
de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i / /
srid pa'i rgya mtsho myur du brgal bar 'gyur / /
zhes dang /
rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo las /
dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni bgrang ba dang tshad bzung bar mi nus te / /
'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur / /
yongs su na gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing /
mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do / /
dpa' bos mdzad pa'i za ma tog lta bu'i gtam las /
me tog bzang po dge 'dun la / /
rab tu 'thor zhing mchod byed pa / /
brgya byin las lhag longs spyod ldan / /
padma'i dbang po lta bur mdzes / /

dgra las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur / /

rin cen mchog gi mir 'gyur ro / /

lus kyi grags pa'i dri yis khyab / /
ut+pal sngon po dang mnyam pa / /

bai DUr+ya dang mu tig dang / /

zhes rang gzhan rnams kyi rgyud kyi zhing sa la bsod nams kyi myu gu rgya cher skrun par byed pa bla na med pa'i sa bon legs byas kyi zhing dam pa ni dge 'dun yin la / /

bshes spring las /

zhes dang /
so thar gyi mdo las /
sems rta kha klan dka' ba la / /
mthun pa'i gzer rnon rgyab pa yi / /
srab ni so so thar pa yin / /
zhes gdul bya nyon mongs kyis rengs pa'i sems rta rgod lta bu 'dul thabs so so thar pa'i tshul khrims kyi srab la brten dgos pas /
spyir so thar rigs brgyad du bshad pa'i dang po'am gtso bo lta bu rab byung gi ba sde gsungs na'ang sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa'i mdo las /
skye bo gang khyim na gnas shing skra dang kha spu yang ma bregs /
chos gos kyang mi gyon /

gsol ba dang /
zhu ba'i las dang /
gso sbyin dang tshul gyi las thams cad kyi nang du mi chud mod kyi 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan la 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob pas na de yang don dam pa'i dge slong du bsdus te /

rnal 'byor dbang phyug ces bya'o / /

ji skad du /
slob 'chad gra la rje yis mthun rkyen sbyorH. bod kyi ban sngags dbu zlum lcang lo canH. zhes mdo sngags kyi mchod gnas sde gnyis su grags par bkur sti'i rim pa /
rje bla ma srid zhi'i gtsug rgyan mchog gi dgongs rdzogs gtsor gyur gyi chu khyi nas lcags rta'i bar dgon gnas nyams gsos chos spyod kyis gtsos dge rgyun dang 'os min gsar sbyor 'jags pa khral chag na 'tsho thebs sogs song gras /
chu khyi stag lung gsang sngags chos 'khor bar mkhar ru'i khal bdun cu don dgu bre bcu gcig phul do /
dge bcu bar 'bru bzang ngan cha snyoms kyi gshor khal brgyad cu re lha rtse yong steng nas lo lo bzhin gshor 'dzin /
chos rje se ston pa tshe dbang rdo rjes gong du nang rten khungs ma kha yar phul 'dug gshis 'di lo nas bzung kho rang khams nam bzang bar 'tsho thebs su bzang 'bru gshor khal bdun cu re lo star gshor 'dzin /
chu phag seng rdzong khul dga' ldan bsam gling dgon gyi gnas 'dzin rnying pa rnams tshul spyod zhan cing dgon gzhis nyams 'chag che bar brten 'di lo gnas 'dzin gsar bcug dang grub mtha' rang phyogs su bsgyur ba'i gzhi rten sngar 'jags dang /

rje bla ma srid zhi'i gtsug rgyan gyi dgongs rdzogs dang bod khams bde thabs la dmigs dge 'dun gyi 'du khang dang gtsug lag khang gsar rgyag sogs la mthun rkyen song ba /
chu khyi chu bo ri brag thog dgon du dkon gnyer bas 'du khang gsar rgyag skabs shing gi mthun rkyen song ba 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal brgya dang nyi shu /
brag dbar gtsug lag khang gi spen bad rgyur phan pa bsgrubs pa'i ri gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal lnga bcu nga lnga bre bzhi /
gzhis rtse khul gtsang 'gram lha khang gi dbus pa'i gtsug lag khang bzhir zhig gsos lcags shing rgyu song gi ri gong dang rdo shing bzo bo 'u lag bcas pa'i phogs gla sogs 'bru ngor bsgril bar mkhar ru'i khal drug brgya zhe gcig bre do phul phyed gsum /

shing glang yar 'brog sman skyong gtsug lag khang gsar ba rgyag gi shing cha mthun rkyen song ba'i ri gong 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal nyis brgya lnga bcu bre bcu gsum phul phyed lhag bcas /
me stag gzhis rtse khul mnga' bdag nyang gi phyag nas mar grags pa'i brag gseb 'bum pa dang mkha' 'gro ma bye bas brtsigs par grags pa'i bye brtsigs 'bum pa gnyis bzo dbyibs zhig gso thub par ma bsdad gshis de kha bsgyur bkod med par nang bzhugs byas pa'i phyi nas byang chub mchod rten gsar bzheng dang /

me yos skyid gshongs nya skyur gtsug lag khang la zhig gso'i shing cha dang 'u lag mthun rkyen song ba ri gong dang gla lto 'brur phab mkhar ru'i khal nyis stong dgu brgya bcu dgu bre bcu phul phyed gsum lnga cha gcig /

mi ser sdad grong rkang bcu gsum dang bcas 'bru ngor phab na dge bed lam tshod bsnan pa bcas mkhar ru'i khal stong dang bzhi brgya nyer bzhi bre gang phul phyed gsum lhag bcas /
tre bo sku skye'i sbra dud gcig zhu rten du phul byung bar 'di lo nas bzung lo bcu tham pa'i ring mkhar ru'i 'bru khal nyer brgyad /
shing glang rgya nag gong ma'i mi sna phun tshogs bla ma'i tsha bo blo bzang dpal ldan 'bras spungs su slob gnyer la sdod ring 'di lo nas bzung lo star mkhar ru'i 'bru khal bco lnga /
'bras spungs rtses thang mi tshan yong 'bab dang zhing dod skyor mo lung nas 'bru mkhar ru'i khal gcig bre do phul phyed do lhag bcas /
rab 'byams pa ngag dbang dpal bzang khams bzang ring lo star chas thebs mkhar ru'i khal nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams 'brel mtshungs nas gshor 'dzin /
de mo sprul pa'i skur kong po de mo khungs dud phyed sum brgya skor yod dbang byas thog /
rdzi tho dgon ma lag rdzi tho'i mi ser thog khyung po bsnan pa'i dud che chung lnga brgya re bzhi bcas pa'i rkang 'gro lag 'don gyi yong 'bab sogs 'byed khra zur gsal nang ltar 'brur phab lam chod mkhar ru'i khal chig 'bum sum khri nyis stong skor yong rtsis bsgrub 'jags lho khog bla chen dpe 'gre dgos pa sogs gtan tshigs dang bcas /
'brug pa sprul pa'i sku chos gzhis kyi zhu don mdzad mu thog chu phag lo mnga' ris su 'brug bstan la dgongs pa'i sne len la phebs chog pa dgos tshul gsung ba bzhed sbyar zhus par yang gzhung bstan la mi 'gyur ba ma byung bar ma zad /
bar skabs chos gzhis la shor god yong ba 'brug nang mtshams dkar g.yeng la brten pa yin 'dug par /

rtswa shing /
g.yog gnyis la dmag ma gtogs phyi nang gi khral dang /

tshes nyer brgyad la rdo rje brag sprul skur bka' shog snyan tshig gi lam nas drangs na pa /
dga' ldan 'gro phan gling gi slob dpon ngag dbang 'jam dbyangs kyis zhus pa'i srung ma'i rgyun gsol /
dge slong don grub pas ma'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sku thang bzhengs pa'i rgyab yig /
dge slong phyag rdor dbang phyug gis rje bla ma srid zhi'i gtsug rgyan dam pa'i sku brnyan gser zangs las grub pa /
blo bzang thabs mkhas kyis smon lam gra skor gyi 'jog dngul srang nyi shu rtsa gsum las grub pa'i kong phul pa'i kha byang /

gser zangs las grub pa'i rje bla ma srid zhi'i gtsug rgyan dam pa'i sku brnyan /
gu ru mtshan brgyad /
byang chub mchod rten rnams dang /
